1975.text: As children head back to school, parents are requested to reinforce the lesson, that railroad tracks should never be used as a path or shortcut
1975.textLower: as children head back to school, parents are requested to reinforce the lesson, that railroad tracks should never be used as a path or shortcut

1976.text: Please join Metra in reminding everone to Look, Listen, and Live
1976.textLower: please join metra in reminding everone to look, listen, and live

1978.text: When using our service, always expect a train on any track at any time. Use caution when crossing tracks, and only cross at designated crosswalks or grade crossings. Remember to look, listen, and live.
1978.textLower: when using our service, always expect a train on any track at any time. use caution when crossing tracks, and only cross at designated crosswalks or grade crossings. remember to look, listen, and live.

1980.text: Please note that the priority seating areas are always designated for customers with disabilities
1980.textLower: please note that the priority seating areas are always designated for customers with disabilities

1981.text: On weekends and during off peak service, customers with bicycles may also use this space. You may be required to relinquish your seat for those customers
1981.textLower: on weekends and during off peak service, customers with bicycles may also use this space. you may be required to relinquish your seat for those customers

1990.text: This is a public safety reminder from operation lifesaver
1990.textLower: this is a public safety reminder from operation lifesaver

1991.text: You should always expect a train when approaching a railroad crossing. Any time is train time. Look, listen, and live. Thank you
1991.textLower: you should always expect a train when approaching a railroad crossing. any time is train time. look, listen, and live. thank you

1992.text: Did you know that railroad tracks are private property? Do not walk, bike, or jog on the tracks. Always use a pedestrian crosswalk to cross tracks. Trespassing is dangerous and illegal. Stay off, stay away, and stay alive.
1992.textLower: did you know that railroad tracks are private property? do not walk, bike, or jog on the tracks. always use a pedestrian crosswalk to cross tracks. trespassing is dangerous and illegal. stay off, stay away, and stay alive.

1993.text: A train hitting your car is like your car running over a soda can. If you see a train coming, don't cross the tracks. Make sure that you do not stop on the tracks: a train always has the right of way
1993.textLower: a train hitting your car is like your car running over a soda can. if you see a train coming, don't cross the tracks. make sure that you do not stop on the tracks: a train always has the right of way

1994.text: Flashing red lights and bells at railroad crossings mean that a train is coming. Whether you are driving or walking, stop immedately, even if the gates are not all the way down. It is not safe to cross the tracks until the lights are no longer flashing
1994.textLower: flashing red lights and bells at railroad crossings mean that a train is coming. whether you are driving or walking, stop immedately, even if the gates are not all the way down. it is not safe to cross the tracks until the lights are no longer flashing

1995.text: Do not stop, pass, or shift on the railroad tracks. Make sure that your car can completely clear the crossing before attempting to cross. Trains overhang the rails by three feet on each side. Being boxed in can cost you your life
1995.textLower: do not stop, pass, or shift on the railroad tracks. make sure that your car can completely clear the crossing before attempting to cross. trains overhang the rails by three feet on each side. being boxed in can cost you your life

1996.text: An operation lifesaver safety blitz will be held at the
1996.textLower: an operation lifesaver safety blitz will be held at the

1999.text: Your attention please, this is a public safety reminder from Metra, the Union Pacific Railroad, the Burlington Northern Santa Fe, and all of Metra's employees and labor organizations. Please, do not walk, bike, or jog on or near railroad tracks. Always cross at the appropriate pedestrian crosswalk. Be safe: always stop, look, and listen. Please convey this message to your children
1999.textLower: your attention please, this is a public safety reminder from metra, the union pacific railroad, the burlington northern santa fe, and all of metra's employees and labor organizations. please, do not walk, bike, or jog on or near railroad tracks. always cross at the appropriate pedestrian crosswalk. be safe: always stop, look, and listen. please convey this message to your children

2975.text: As children head back to school, parents are requested to reinforce the lesson that railroad tracks should never be used as a path or shortcut
2975.textLower: as children head back to school, parents are requested to reinforce the lesson that railroad tracks should never be used as a path or shortcut

2976.text: Please join Metra in reminding everone to Look, Listen, and Live
2976.textLower: please join metra in reminding everone to look, listen, and live

2978.text: When using our service, always expect a train on any track at any time. Use caution when crossing tracks, and only cross at designated crosswalks or grade crossings. Remember to look, listen, and live.
2978.textLower: when using our service, always expect a train on any track at any time. use caution when crossing tracks, and only cross at designated crosswalks or grade crossings. remember to look, listen, and live.

2980.text: Please note that the priority seating areas are always designated for customers with disabilities
2980.textLower: please note that the priority seating areas are always designated for customers with disabilities

2981.text: On weekends and during off peak service, customers with bicycles may also use this space. You may be required to relinquish your seat for those customers
2981.textLower: on weekends and during off peak service, customers with bicycles may also use this space. you may be required to relinquish your seat for those customers

2990.text: This is a public safety reminder from operation lifesaver
2990.textLower: this is a public safety reminder from operation lifesaver

2991.text: You should always expect a train when approaching a railroad crossing. Any time is train time. Look, listen, and live. Thank you
2991.textLower: you should always expect a train when approaching a railroad crossing. any time is train time. look, listen, and live. thank you

2992.text: Did you know that railroad tracks are private property? Do not walk, bike, or jog on the tracks. Always use a pedestrian crosswalk to cross tracks. Trespassing is dangerous and illegal. Stay off, stay away, and stay alive.
2992.textLower: did you know that railroad tracks are private property? do not walk, bike, or jog on the tracks. always use a pedestrian crosswalk to cross tracks. trespassing is dangerous and illegal. stay off, stay away, and stay alive.

2993.text: A train hitting your car is like your car running over a soda can. If you see a train coming, do not cross the tracks. Make sure that you don't stop on the tracks: a train always has the right of way
2993.textLower: a train hitting your car is like your car running over a soda can. if you see a train coming, do not cross the tracks. make sure that you don't stop on the tracks: a train always has the right of way

2994.text: Flashing red lights and bells at railroad crossings mean that a train is coming. Whether you are driving or walking, stop immedately, even if the gates are not all the way down. It is not safe to cross the tracks until the lights are no longer flashing
2994.textLower: flashing red lights and bells at railroad crossings mean that a train is coming. whether you are driving or walking, stop immedately, even if the gates are not all the way down. it is not safe to cross the tracks until the lights are no longer flashing

2995.text: Do not stop, pass, or shift on the railroad tracks. Make sure that your car can completely clear the crossing before attempting to cross. Trains overhang the rails by three feet on each side. Being boxed in can cost you your life
2995.textLower: do not stop, pass, or shift on the railroad tracks. make sure that your car can completely clear the crossing before attempting to cross. trains overhang the rails by three feet on each side. being boxed in can cost you your life

2996.text: An operation lifesaver safety blitz will be held at
2996.textLower: an operation lifesaver safety blitz will be held at

2999.text: Your attention please, this is a public safety reminder from Metra, the Union Pacific Railroad, the Burlington Northern Santa Fe, and all of Metra's employees and labor organizations. Please, do not walk, bike, or jog on or near railroad tracks. Always cross at the appropriate pedestrian crosswalk. Be safe: always stop, look, and listen. Please convey this message to your children
2999.textLower: your attention please, this is a public safety reminder from metra, the union pacific railroad, the burlington northern santa fe, and all of metra's employees and labor organizations. please, do not walk, bike, or jog on or near railroad tracks. always cross at the appropriate pedestrian crosswalk. be safe: always stop, look, and listen. please convey this message to your children

1_1450266432.text: At this time, please launch your mobile tickets or have your paper tickets on display. Conductors will be around shortly to check all tickets. Thank you
